message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you this unique product that I believe will be of great value to you. After careful consideration, I've set a price that I think is fair and reflects its worth. I'm looking forward to hearing your thoughts.

Hello Alice, thank you for your offer. I appreciate the value you've placed on the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of a lower price point. I'm interested in purchasing the product, and I believe we can find a mutually beneficial price.

Hello Bob, thank you for your offer. I appreciate your interest in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of a higher price point. Considering the product's value, I'm willing to make a compromise and lower the price from my initial offer. I believe we can find a mutually beneficial price.

Hello Alice, thank you for your revised offer. I appreciate the compromise, but I still think the price is a bit higher than I'm willing to pay. I'm interested in purchasing the product, and I'm willing to meet you halfway between my previous offer and your revised offer.
